svg.title: CE-03: ROI Acceleration and Compound Benefits Timeline
svg.desc: Sophisticated timeline visualization showing accelerating returns from principle implementation, with compounding effect curves, milestone-based ROI jumps, and predictive modeling for long-term benefits with business case development focus.
